title: Designing DEI Strategies for Building an Inclusive Higher Education Environment at Scale

context.prior_knowledge: Sociostructural Understanding at the Level of Professionals (Medical/Legal/Technical), Awareness of Basic DEI Concepts
context.additional_context: Professional education requiring multiple access approaches in a BYOD environment. Cultivates the ability to apply DEI (Diversity, Equity, Inclusion) to real job situations through PBL (Project-Based Learning)

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more inclusive lesson design strategies by applying UDL (Universal Design for Learning) principles
Learners can develop two educational strategies to support multicultural learners after analyzing DEI (Diversity, Equity, Inclusion) issues
Learners can create one DEI evaluation tool applicable to real educational institutions through PBL (Project-Based Learning) projects
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
